cxro.common.io.modbus

Interface Modbus


  • public interface Modbus
    Interface defining all constants related to the Modbus protocol.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ACKNOWLEDGE_EXCEPTION
      Defines the Modbus server exception type ACKNOWLEDGE.
      static int DEFAULT_PORT
      Defines the default port number of Modbus (=502).
      static int DEFAULT_PROTOCOL_ID
      Defines the default protocol identifier (=0).
      static int DEFAULT_TIMEOUT
      Defines the default setting for I/O operation timeouts in milliseconds (=3000).
      static int DEFAULT_TRANSACTION_ID
      Defines the default transaction identifier (=0).
      static int DEFAULT_UNIT_ID
      Defines the default unit identifier (=0).
      static int EXCEPTION_OFFSET
      Defines the Modbus server exception offset that is added to the function code, to flag an exception.
      static int ILLEGAL_ADDRESS_EXCEPTION
      Defines the Modbus server exception type illegal data address.
      static int ILLEGAL_FUNCTION_EXCEPTION
      Defines the Modbus server exception type illegal function.
      static int ILLEGAL_VALUE_EXCEPTION
      Defines the Modbus server exception type illegal data value.
      static int MAX_MESSAGE_LENGTH
      Defines the maximum ADU message length in bytes (=260).
      static int MAX_READ_BITS
      Defines the maximum number of bits in read of multiple input discretes or coils (2000).
      static int MAX_READ_REGISTERS
      Defines the maximum number of registers in read of multiple registers (125).
      static int MAX_TRANSACTION_ID
      Defines the maximum value of the transaction identifier.
      static int MAX_WRITE_BITS
      Defines the maximum number of bits in write of multiple input discretes or coils (1968).
      static int MAX_WRITE_REGISTERS
      Defines the maximum number of registers in write of multiple registers (123).
      static int READ_COILS
      Defines the function code FC01 = Read Coils.
      static int READ_DISCRETE_INPUTS
      Defines the function code FC02 = Read Discrete Inputs.
      static int READ_HOLDING_REGISTERS
      Defines the function code FC03 = Read Holding Registers.
      static int READ_INPUT_REGISTERS
      Defines the function code FC04 = Read Input Registers.
      static int RPC_MESSAGE
      Defines the function code FC102 = RPC MESSAGE.
      static int SLAVE_DEVICE_BUSY_EXCEPTION
      Defines the Modbus server exception type SLAVE DEVICE BUSY.
      static int SLAVE_DEVICE_FAILURE_EXCEPTION
      Defines the Modbus server exception type SLAVE DEVICE FAILURE.
      static int WRITE_MULTIPLE_COILS
      Defines the function code FC15 = Write Multiple Coils.
      static int WRITE_MULTIPLE_REGISTERS
      Defines the function code FC16 = Write Multiple Registers.
      static int WRITE_SINGLE_COIL
      Defines the function code FC05 = Write Single Coil.
      static int WRITE_SINGLE_REGISTER
      Defines the function code FC06 = Write Single Register.

      • MAX_WRITE_REGISTERS

        static final int MAX_WRITE_REGISTERS
        Defines the maximum number of registers in write of multiple registers (123).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXCEPTION_OFFSET

        static final int EXCEPTION_OFFSET
        Defines the Modbus server exception offset that is added to the function code, to flag an exception.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ILLEGAL_FUNCTION_EXCEPTION

        static final int ILLEGAL_FUNCTION_EXCEPTION
        Defines the Modbus server exception type illegal function. This exception code is returned if the server:
        • does not implement the function code or
        • is not in a state that allows it to process the function
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ILLEGAL_ADDRESS_EXCEPTION

        static final int ILLEGAL_ADDRESS_EXCEPTION
        Defines the Modbus server exception type illegal data address. This exception code is returned if the reference:
        • does not exist on the server or
        • the combination of reference and length exceeds the bounds of the existing registers.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ILLEGAL_VALUE_EXCEPTION

        static final int ILLEGAL_VALUE_EXCEPTION
        Defines the Modbus server exception type illegal data value. This exception code indicates a fault in the structure of the data values of a complex request, such as an incorrect implied length.
        This code does not indicate a problem with application specific validity of the value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SLAVE_DEVICE_FAILURE_EXCEPTION

        static final int SLAVE_DEVICE_FAILURE_EXCEPTION
        Defines the Modbus server exception type SLAVE DEVICE FAILURE. The server (or slave) is not responding to requested action. This might be due to either a recoverable or unrecoverable fault.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACKNOWLEDGE_EXCEPTION

        static final int ACKNOWLEDGE_EXCEPTION
        Defines the Modbus server exception type ACKNOWLEDGE. The server (or slave) has accepted the request and is processing it, but a long duration of time will be required to do so.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SLAVE_DEVICE_BUSY_EXCEPTION

        static final int SLAVE_DEVICE_BUSY_EXCEPTION
        Defines the Modbus server exception type SLAVE DEVICE BUSY. The server (or slave) is engaged in processing a long–duration program command. The client (or master) should retransmit the message later when the server (or slave) is free.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_PORT

        static final int DEFAULT_PORT
        Defines the default port number of Modbus (=502).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_TIMEOUT

        static final int DEFAULT_TIMEOUT
        Defines the default setting for I/O operation timeouts in milliseconds (=3000).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_MESSAGE_LENGTH

        static final int MAX_MESSAGE_LENGTH
        Defines the maximum ADU message length in bytes (=260).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_TRANSACTION_ID

        static final int DEFAULT_TRANSACTION_ID
        Defines the default transaction identifier (=0).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_PROTOCOL_ID

        static final int DEFAULT_PROTOCOL_ID
        Defines the default protocol identifier (=0).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_UNIT_ID

        static final int DEFAULT_UNIT_ID
        Defines the default unit identifier (=0).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_TRANSACTION_ID

        static final int MAX_TRANSACTION_ID
        Defines the maximum value of the transaction identifier.
        See Also:
